name: test_e2e_with_logs[080_SQLI_ERROR_014]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_014` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL information schema enumeration |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (1)=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name LIKE '%user%') --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%281%29%3D%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_name%20LIKE%20%27%25user%25%27%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~58000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:31.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_014-1772268931709-a7m6ip pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_014 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%281%29%3D%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_name%20LIKE%20%27%25user%25%27%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_014-1772268931709-a7m6ip pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_014 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%281%29%3D%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_name%20LIKE%20%27%25user%25%27%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:55:31.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_014-1772268931709-a7m6ip pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_014 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%281%29%3D%28SELECT%20COUNT%28%2A%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_name%20LIKE%20%27%25user%25%27%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
